description: This file is a Dart source file defining the HomeShell stateful widget which manages the main navigation structure of a Flutter-based restaurant app. It includes UI layout logic, navigation drawer, bottom navigation, app bar actions, and cart modal sheet.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: Main widget managing the overall page layout with bottom navigation, drawer, app bar, and cart handling.

classes.name: _CartSheet
classes.description: Widget displaying current shopping cart contents with options to modify quantities, clear, or checkout.

classes.name: _CheckoutDialog
classes.description: Dialog for user order confirmation with input fields for name and note, and order summary.

classes.name: _ProfilePage
classes.description: Profile screen displaying user info and settings placeholders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the main UI layout, including app bar, drawer, bottom navigation, and pages.

methods.name: _openCartSheet
methods.description: Opens modal bottom sheet showing the cart contents.

methods.name: placeOrderFromCart
methods.description: Static method in OrdersPage to process placing an order from the cart.
